subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: One of the more well-regarded backup infielders in baseball, Alex Cora will fill the role held by Damion Easley for the last two years and represent a capable option at second base.
snippet: One of the more well-regarded backup infielders in baseball, Alex Cora will fill the role held by Damion Easley for the last two years and represent a capable option at second base.
